query: void absval(float* data, int channels, int size) { for (int q = 0; q < channels; q++) { float* ptr = data + q * size; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { if (ptr[i] < 0) ptr[i] = -ptr[i]; } } }
code_v0_no_empty_lines: void absval(float* data, int channels, int size) { for (int q = 0; q < channels; q++) { float* ptr = data + q * size; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { if (ptr[i] < 0) ptr[i] = -ptr[i]; } } }

query: void eltwise(vector<float*> data_vec, float* out_data, int channels, int size, int op_type, float* alpha) { if (op_type == 1) { for (int q = 0; q < channels; q++) { float* ptr = data_vec[0] + q * size; float* ptr1 = data_vec[1] + q * size; float* outptr = out_data + q * size; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { outptr[i] = ptr[i] * alpha[0] + ptr1[i] * alpha[1]; } } } }
code_v0_no_empty_lines: void eltwise(vector<float*> data_vec, float* out_data, int channels, int size, int op_type, float* alpha) { if (op_type == 1) { for (int q = 0; q < channels; q++) { float* ptr = data_vec[0] + q * size; float* ptr1 = data_vec[1] + q * size; float* outptr = out_data + q * size; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { outptr[i] = ptr[i] * alpha[0] + ptr1[i] * alpha[1]; } } } }

query: void innerproduct(float* in_data, float* weight_data, float* bias_data, float* out_data, int num_output, int size) { for (int p = 0; p < num_output; p++) { float sum = bias_data[p]; const float* w = (const float*)weight_data + size * p; const float* m = (const float*)in_data; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { sum += m[i] * w[i]; } out_data[p] = sum; } }
code_v0_no_empty_lines: void innerproduct(float* in_data, float* weight_data, float* bias_data, float* out_data, int num_output, int size) { for (int p = 0; p < num_output; p++) { float sum = bias_data[p]; const float* w = (const float*)weight_data + size * p; const float* m = (const float*)in_data; for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { sum += m[i] * w[i]; } out_data[p] = sum; } }
